topics.author: 554d477e63687270dee30600

topics.body:
"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ddb3463687224890000a4#post_559ddb3463687224890000a4
its an amazing psychological romance series that dives into our desires with a main character who has to choose between joining as a member of society or becoming a complete outcast who embraces deviance. the shows animation is incredibly unique and really fits well with the odd atmosphere of the show. its also filled to the brim with great analogies and symbolism. one of the most intelligent love series that ive ever sat through

[spoiler]Fuck you![/spoiler][/bq]

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559dc99d63687232e1000d02#post_559dc99d63687232e1000d02
[bq="uc9"]"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559dc8fb63687232e1000c2a#post_559dc8fb63687232e1000c2a
Cause you're not worth a witty retort.[/bq]
no offence intended, but man if i was fuckin serious, you'd know

i'm so fucking tired of getting this shit, either you guys are so fucking high and mighty with your brainpower you've refused to see that there was NO *FUCKING* WAY i could _POSSIBLY_ be serious about denouncing the intelligent (which, as i've noticed, are wise enough not to label themselves as nerds) or you're just fuckin with me

i hope you're fuckin with me and just being an asshole. i honestly really do. because i've gotten so much fucking flak for insulting the intelligent i'm starting to assume it's a goddamn complex with some people; i.e. "B-BUT I'M SMART D: Y-YOU CAN'T _SAY_ THAT ABOUT UUUUUS!!!"

that kind of absolute fucking disregard for the comprehension that nobody could ever be that fucking dumb is really goddamn annoying, you know why? every single goddamn psuedointellectual i bring that shit near goes "but we DO things" and like... fuck you, no, you've contributed jack shit to society you goddamn holier-than-thou prick. you sound SO fucking stuck up when you can't realize that an attack on something with a history of progression is beÂ­_yond_ the realm of sincerity, alright?

holy FUCKING shit get over yourself and learn to take the piss in the things you do

and as a final clarification, i'm not mad, just sick of this complete lack of perceptional judgement as i've seen it far more than i'd like to

it's on par with the basis of thinking that reading lovecraft turns you into some sort of fucking braniac. no, no, it's following a popular trend. and i'm certain that those who actually got into lovecraft's work by their own accord and curiosity free from the influence of others don't appreciate it all that much

don't fool yourself into thinking that intelligence is #1 on the "what makes me fucking awesome" list because you're going to end up with a butchered conception of a whole hell of a lot of things
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
Okay wow; I kind of knew something like this might happen, but just wow.

What did I read that was interesting?  Well it was a bit about virtual reality.  Basically a tech news site I follow was talking about why virtual reality in the short run will fail but in the long run be incredibly successful.

For brevity's sake and that I'm drinking right now and can't be bothered to type it all out I'll summarize:
1)Facebook and all the large companies investing in virtual reality have no fucking clue what they are doing.
2)They're pushing commercial versions out already when it's too expensive right now.  $300 for vr headsets is not a good idea.
3)VR development has devolved into a metaphorical pissing match between the companies rather than financially planning it out.
4)The people in charge of development have no fucking clue what people want; facebook thinks people want to have virtual offices to play in after they get home from work.

*In the short run* all the vr systems will probably flop hard cause the AAA companies currently working on it have no fucking clue what they are doing financially or developmentally.


And here is the interesting bit: what is probably going to drive the development of virtual reality in the long run and in the long run make it popular?  Easy porn.


To make it short "why would porn drive the development of virtual reality?"  Easy: if the AAA companies are pissing away their money on hardware development expecting people to be buying the oculus to play "work simulator VR edition" at home then that's a hell of a developmental vacuum.  What you have to understand about the porn industry is that it's more of a cooperation industry rather than a competitive industry.  When sales of porn started going down rather than cutting each other's throats to win they essentially worked together to try to figure out how to keep the industry from falling any further, and now the industry has stabilized cause they worked together.

What might happen essentially is chances are we're going to see porn companies working on developing vr together rather than against each other.  I don't necessarily mean open source so much as freeware software that they all work in conjunction.



Tl:dr; porn might drive the development of virtual reality cause AAA companies are pissing away their money on stupid shit and pissing away their money on marking their territory rather than making sure the fucking device has any game support.  The porn industry however is using their money smarter and cooperating to make porn games.

"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559de04c6368727de100049a#post_559de04c6368727de100049a
You do realize we were fucking with you right?  I'm currently too drunk to take things seriously.
